TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Vahu, title = Vahu, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vahu} }

S.FORM: Vahu Itiniay i Haiduan Cen no Taitung ko Vahu a niyaro', 38 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 102 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 101 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bunun83%, Amis7%, Paiwan2%, roma7%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.

Vaho Itiniay i Haidoan Cen no Taitong ko Vaho a niyaro', 38 ko sa'osi no parod no loma', 102 ko sa'osi no tamdaw. 99% ko ka'aloman no Yincomin, polong han i, 101 ko tamdaw; o roma sato i, 1% ko ka'aloman no roma a finacadan, polong han i, 1 ko tamdaw. O pa-sin-to no ka'aloman no tamdaw no kasafinacadan i, ko Bonon83%, Amis7%, Paiwan2%, roma7%. Ira ko picodadan i niyaro'.
